programme.title: Interview With a Killer
programme.desc: A gruesome video on a stolen SD card exposes Brian Steven Smith's secret double life; David Scott confronts this soft-spoken husband and serial killer about his nighttime hunts for vulnerable Alaskan women.

programme.title: Interview With a Killer
programme.desc: Yaser Said breaks his silence about the night he fatally shot his teenage daughters near Dallas, Texas, the events leading up to the tragedy, and how he managed to evade capture for over a decade.

programme.title: 48 Hours
programme.desc: A decorated former U.S. Army soldier who pretended to take on a hit job for two Houston-area doctors talks about the case.

programme.title: 48 Hours
programme.desc: A mother's concerns lead police to the scene of her daughter's murder in the Los Angeles home she shared with her producer boyfriend.

programme.title: 48 Hours
programme.desc: Sheila, a mother of two in Florida, claims she had a dream about her friend's murder, but authorities think Sheila is a killer rather than clairvoyant.

programme.title: It Takes a Killer
programme.desc: The murder of a husband and his pregnant wife leaving a child birthing class leaves police thinking it was a random shooting until they find the real perpetrator weeks later.

programme.title: It Takes a Killer
programme.desc: Nearly three years pass before the mastermind who murdered three members of an affluent family inside their home is found.

programme.title: It Takes a Killer
programme.desc: The murder of a woman in her therapist's parking lot looks like a random shooting, but evidence soon reveals that the murder is part of a larger scheme.

programme.title: It Takes a Killer
programme.desc: Law enforcement discovers the man who had been killing prostitutes in upstate New York for two years was living amongst the dead bodies of his victims that were stashed in his home.

programme.title: It Takes a Killer
programme.desc: A local businesswoman's disappearance launches a homicide investigation when police find microscopic evidence in her home and car.

programme.title: It Takes a Killer
programme.desc: A serial killer crisscrosses California until his inner demons lead him to show up at a local Sheriff's Department with a victim's body part in his jacket pocket.

programme.title: It Takes a Killer
programme.desc: The disappearance of a wealthy retiree in South Florida quickly turns from a missing person's case to a full blown homicide investigation focused around an unexpected perpetrator and her convoluted plan to get away with murder.

programme.title: It Takes a Killer
programme.desc: Cops investigate the apparent carjacking of a husband and wife in East Los Angeles, California only to discover that the ambush was a ruse, carried out by cousins, to kill the husband for insurance money.

programme.title: It Takes a Killer
programme.desc: A bizarre lovers' triangle turns lethal and a mother of two suddenly disappears.

programme.title: It Takes a Killer
programme.desc: A father, husband and businessman is actually a sadomasochistic con-man who lures unsuspecting women with a web of lies and empty promises only to trap them in a world of sex slavery and murder.

programme.title: It Takes a Killer
programme.desc: A wayward, homeless ex-marine drifts through central Oregon, committing petty crimes here and there, until he spots Amyjane and gets the urge to kill.

programme.title: It Takes a Killer
programme.desc: A murderous doctor has practiced his deadly hobby and avoided getting caught for a decade, but now the police are determined to track him down before he kills again.

programme.title: VPI: Vinnie Politan Investigates
programme.desc: Vinnie Politan takes a deep dive into the true crime stories that are captivating the world over.

programme.title: Corrupt Crimes
programme.desc: A homeless housekeeper bludgeons his employers to death; an astronaut goes on a 900-mile road trip to seek retribution from her ex-lover's new partner.

programme.title: Corrupt Crimes
programme.desc: American college student Amanda Knox, studying abroad, finds herself facing a lifetime behind bars after her roommate is murdered.

programme.title: Corrupt Crimes
programme.desc: A police officer kills a father of six with an illegal chokehold; the FBI hunts for computer hacker Kevin Mitnick.

programme.title: Corrupt Crimes
programme.desc: A high-ranking government official authorizes deportation of more than 1,400 Jews to Nazi concentration camps; Enron collapses due to creative accounting practices and greed.

programme.title: Corrupt Crimes
programme.desc: A British male model's night of sex, drugs and violence ends in murder; a body stuffed in a suitcase in Bali.

programme.title: Corrupt Crimes
programme.desc: After his wife is murdered, mild-mannered chemist Mark Barton uses the life-insurance money to dive into the risky world of day-trading; a designer turns his young models into victims of sexual abuse.

programme.title: Corrupt Crimes
programme.desc: A brilliant banker is found dead wearing only a head-to-toe bodysuit.

programme.title: Corrupt Crimes
programme.desc: Two gunmen execute a banker who is trying to clean up corruption in the Russian system.

programme.title: Someone They Knew with Tamron Hall
programme.desc: Successful Atlanta entrepreneur Lance Herndon usually got what he wanted, but when he is found bludgeoned to death in his waterbed, it appeared he got more than he could handle, possibly due to a business deal gone wrong or a girlfriend's revenge.

programme.title: Someone They Knew with Tamron Hall
programme.desc: When an unknown assailant guns down sheriff-elect Derwin Brown shortly after winning his election, investigators suspect a political assassination, only to instead uncover an extensive trail of corruption.

programme.title: Someone They Knew with Tamron Hall
programme.desc: S01/E120 Bad things happen to the people close to Robert Durst. His wife disappeared without a trace. His best friend was killed in her home.

programme.title: Someone They Knew with Tamron Hall
programme.desc: When the body of 22-year-old Misty Morse is found floating in the Indian River, police suspect one of her many boyfriends; with only a piece of nautical rope and a strip of duct tape to go on, an unusual kind of DNA could actually break the case.

programme.title: 48 Hours
programme.desc: A "48 Hours" report helps trip up a wanted fugitive who spent more than four years on the run for allegedly killing his wife and staging a kidnapping scheme.

programme.title: 48 Hours
programme.desc: A man charged with killing his wife maintains it was a suicide.

programme.desc: When a doctor is charged with killing his wife, his daughter's 911 call becomes important to the case.

programme.desc: A fight between a married couple ends in gunfire.
